Monologue.Current: Ведж{Line}“Нам сообщили, что на вершине{Line} башни видели тень огромного монстра!”
Monologue.Original: Wedge{Line}“There has been a report{Line} of a monster-shaped shadow{Line} on top of the tower.”

Monologue.Current: Биггз{Line}“Погоди! Я занят!”{Next}“Это вот так... Ах ты ж... твою мать!..{Line} Давай же, работай, проклятая железяка!”{Next}“И... ну... ну же... Почему я должен{Line} заниматься ремонтом?! Аааааргх!!!”
Monologue.Original: Biggs{Line}“Be quiet!{Line} I’m busy!”{Next}“This goes like this...and...{Line} Geez, what’s with these{Line} crappy old tools?”{Next}“And...and...{Line} Why do I have to make all the repairs!?{Line} AHHH!!!”

Monologue.Current: Биггз{Line}“Посмотрим... Хмм...{Line} Это вставить сюда... и...”
Monologue.Original: Biggs{Line}“Let’s see... Hmmm...{Line} Put this here...and...”

Monologue.Current: Ведж{Line}“Сэр, я проверю периметр,{Line} пока вы заняты ремонтом.”
Monologue.Original: Wedge{Line}“Sir, I’ll check around while{Line} the repairs are being done.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Dollet has a communication tower that can{Line} transmit and receive radio waves.”{Next}“It had been abandoned for a long time,{Line} but the Galbadian Army got it{Line} up and running yesterday.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Dollet has a communication tower that can{Line} transmit and receive radio waves.”{Next}“It had been abandoned for a long time,{Line} but the Galbadian Army got it{Line} up and running yesterday.”

Monologue.Current: Zone{Line}“The only TV station that can handle{Line} broadcasts over the air is in Timber.”{Next}“Other stations use HD cable,{Line} which only supports online broadcasting.”
Monologue.Original: Zone{Line}“The only TV station that can handle{Line} broadcasts over the air is in Timber.”{Next}“Other stations use HD cable,{Line} which only supports online broadcasting.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So, what’s that supposed to mean?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So, what’s that supposed to mean?”

Monologue.Current: Zone{Line}“They’re planning on using radio waves.”{Next}“This way, they can transmit images to{Line} regions without cable.”
Monologue.Original: Zone{Line}“They’re planning on using radio waves.”{Next}“This way, they can transmit images to{Line} regions without cable.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“I know that...!”{Next}“What I want to know is, what is{Line} the president going to broadcast!?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“I know that...!”{Next}“What I want to know is, what is{Line} the president going to broadcast!?”
